Header: Large number of rules an inconvenience to the people; says Miniser Anura Yapa.
Content: Environment Minister Anura Priyadarshana Yaapaa says having too many laws in a country inconvenience the people. The Minister said so when he met the Environment Ministry staff yesterday in view of the New Year. On this occasion the Minister also expressed his views about the impeachment. Meanwhile at a media briefing held yesterday member of PSC on impeachment against the Chief Justice Minister Dilan Perera also expressed his views with regard to the statement the Chief Justice had made through her lawyers with regard to resignation from her post.
